arm_group.description: After deployment of therapeutic mesh in the preperitoneal space of the abdomen wall during the procedure, the treatment group will receive infusion of 15 cc 0.5% Bupivicaine.
After deployment of therapeutic mesh in the preperitoneal space of the abdomen wall during the procedure, the placebo group will receive the infusion of 15 cc 0.9% Saline.

brief_summary.textblock:
To assess effect of local anesthetic into the preperitoneal space during laparoscopic hernia
      repair on post-operative pain.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Local Anesthesia on Post-operative Pain During Laparoscopic Inguinal Hernia Repair
clinical_study.condition: Post Operative Pain (Post Laparoscopic Hernia Repair)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Age 18 or older with unilateral or bilateral inguinal herna for laparoscopic repair

          -  American Society of Anesthesiology (ASA) Class I and II

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Conversion from laparoscopic to open surgery

          -  History of Chronic pain or ongoing treatment for chronic pain

          -  Age less than 18 yrs

          -  Allergy to local anesthetics

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo-controlled Trial of the Effects of Infusing Local Anesthesia on Post-operative Pain During Laparoscopic Inguinal Hernia Repair

primary_outcome.description: Hourly Post Op for four hours,Then once every 24 hours for four weeks
primary_outcome.measure: Visual Analog Scale Pain Score Assessment
